caption.p: Sensitivity of chimeric viruses to swine neutralizing antibodies to Bartha-K61. (A) Sensitivity of PRV strain HB1201 and its derivatives to anti-Bartha-K61 sera. (B) Sensitivity of PRV Bartha-K61 and its derivatives to anti-Bartha-K61 serum. Virus neutralization assays were performed with antisera from three individual piglets. The data represent means Â± standard deviations (SD) of three replicates. Asterisk indicates a significant difference: * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001; NS: no difference.
